title: Apocalypse
lyrics:
[intro] (F) (Dm) (Am) (Am) x2                                             
You leapt (F) from crumbling bridges watching (Dm)cityscapes turn to (Am)dust (C)
Filming he-(F)-licopters crashing in the (Dm)ocean from way a-(Am)bove (C)
 
[chorus]
Got the (Bb)music in you baby, tell me (F)why
Got the (Bb)music in you baby, tell me (Dm)why                                      
You've been (Bb)locked in here forever and you (C)just can't say good(F)bye (F)
 
(F)Kisses on the foreheads of the (Dm)lovers wrapped in your (Am)arms (C)
You've been hi-(F)-ding them in hollowed out (Dm)pianos left in the (Am)dark (C)
 
[chorus]
Got the (Bb)music in you baby, tell me (F)why
Got the (Bb)music in you baby, tell me (Dm)why                                      
You've been (Bb)locked in here forever and you (C)just can't say good(F)bye (F)
 
[bridge]
(Gm) Your lips, my lips… (Gm) apocalypse (Am) (Am)
(Gm) Your lips, my lips… (Gm) apocalypse (Am) (Am)
Go and (Bb)sneak us through the rivers flood is (Gm)rising up on your (F)knees
Oh (Dm)please
(Gm) Come out and haunt me, (Gm) I know you want me
(C) Come out and haunt me (C)
 
Sha-(F)-ring all your secrets with each (Dm)other since you were (Am)kids (C)
Sleeping sou-(F)-ndly with the locket that she (Dm)gave you clutched in your (Am)fist (C)
 
[chorus]
Got the (Bb)music in you baby, tell me (F)why
Got the (Bb)music in you baby, tell me (Dm)why                                      
You've been (Bb)locked in here forever and you (C)just can't say good(F)bye (F)
(Bb) (F) (Bb) (F)
You've been (Bb)locked in here forever and you (C)just can't say good(F)bye (F) [end]
